text: Need Brandon Nelson for Queen Fine Foods campaign. Budget around $20,869, looking for 1 x Professional headshots, 1 x Product launch event, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Professional headshots. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
